attributes.action: Close UK Schools due to Corona Virus
attributes.additional_details: We should close all UK schools temporarily because families are starting to self isolate and it can prevent spread to teachers, grandparents etc. Schools with nurseries should especially get closed. Schools can get children onto temporary online learning. This will decrease the spread and keep everyone healthy.
attributes.background: We need to close all UK schools due to corona virus. If not, it should be required that students get one day off the the school can be heavily deep cleaned.
